description: Hard-reset cleanup to remove legacy global-mode residue and align CLI/docs/skills/examples around NotionFlow's project-local, library-first architecture.

userStories.title: Clean up CLI surface for hard-reset onboarding
userStories.description: As a new user, I want top-level CLI help to present only the project-local baseline so I am not guided into deprecated global workflows.
acceptanceCriteria: Top-level help no longer presents setup/config/board as the primary onboarding path
Legacy onboarding commands setup/config/board are removed from the CLI surface and return unknown command errors
CLI description text reflects library-first positioning
Typecheck passes
Tests pass

userStories.title: Canonicalize docs to one local-project quickstart
userStories.description: As a user, I want README and docs to show one canonical quickstart so onboarding is unambiguous.
acceptanceCriteria: README and docs use one command sequence: init -> factory create -> doctor -> tick
No user-facing docs instruct editing/installing workflows under ~/.config/notionflow
No user-facing docs reference factory install
Docs consistently describe walk-up config discovery and --config override
Typecheck passes
Tests pass

userStories.title: Rewrite local setup skill for project-local mode
userStories.description: As a user running the setup skill, I want generated instructions to match the current project-local architecture so setup guidance is accurate.
acceptanceCriteria: skills/setup/SKILL.md removes global-path initialization and config set workflow
Skill instructions use notionflow.config.ts and .notionflow project-local conventions
Skill examples avoid deprecated commands and match current CLI behavior
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Rewrite add-factory skill without install flow
userStories.description: As a user running the add-factory skill, I want factory authoring guidance that uses explicit config declaration and local files without install/copy steps.
acceptanceCriteria: skills/add-factory/SKILL.md removes factory install instructions
Skill teaches local file scaffold plus notionflow.config.ts factories array updates
Skill examples mention package helper imports and local execution paths
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Make example-factories a standalone runnable package
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the example project to include its own package metadata and scripts so it is runnable in isolation.
acceptanceCriteria: Add example-factories/package.json with runnable scripts for doctor and tick workflows
example-factories/README.md documents exact setup, env vars, and script usage from a clean checkout
Example remains compliant with project-local structure (notionflow.config.ts, factories, shared helpers)
Typecheck passes
Tests pass

userStories.title: Add legacy-pattern guardrail checks for docs and skills
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want automated checks that fail when legacy global guidance reappears so the hard reset remains enforced.
acceptanceCriteria: Add automated scan over docs and skills for forbidden patterns: ~/.config/notionflow workflow editing/install guidance and factory install
Add assertions for required local-project terms such as notionflow.config.ts and --config in canonical docs/skills
Guardrail check is wired into the CI-visible command path
Failure output includes file path and offending snippet
Typecheck passes
Tests pass

userStories.title: Publish hard-reset cleanup release checklist
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a release sign-off checklist covering CLI/docs/skills/examples consistency so hard-reset communication is evidence-based.
acceptanceCriteria: Create a checklist document under tasks/ for hard-reset cleanup validation
Checklist includes CLI help audit, docs audit, skills audit, examples audit, and no-global-write verification
Checklist maps required verification commands and expected outcomes
Checklist execution results are captured once before release
Typecheck passes
